trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임 보기에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class with the provided data source designer and view name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> 클래스를 제공 된 데이터 원본 디자이너와 뷰 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 부모 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 지원는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>메서드는 지원 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 지원는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>메서드는 지원 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 제어 하 여 검색 데이터를 통한 페이징을 지원는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>검색 되는 데이터를 통한 페이징을 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>메서드는 지원 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 컨트롤은 데이터 원본의 정렬된 된 뷰를 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a sorted view of the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>원본 데이터의 정렬된 된 뷰 지원 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 지원는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>메서드는 지원 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개수의 행을 사용 하 여 연결 된 데이터 소스 제어의 스키마와 일치 하는 디자인 타임 데이터를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: 고 데이터가 샘플 인지 실제 데이터 인지 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 행의 최소 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>반환 된 데이터가 샘플 데이터 임을 나타내려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 반환 된 데이터가 라이브 데이터 임을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 표시할 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*> property contains an object that derives from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>속성에서 파생 되는 개체가 포함 되어 <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*> property is derived from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우에 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>속성에서 파생 된 <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*> property returns a <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> type.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>속성 반환 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> 유형.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*> property returns a <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>속성에서 반환 된 <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> ; 입력 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 보기 개체에 의해 표시 되는 데이터 원본 뷰를 설명 하는 스키마를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the schema.
trans-unit.target: 개체 스키마를 나타내는입니다.
